_sName: AWP NOSCOPE ULTIMATE MAP-PACK by crash/z/
_sText:
AWP NOSCOPE ULTIMATE MAP-PACK by crash/z/
=========================================
> ### This map-pack includes 10 maps:

	- awp_crashz
	- awp_crashz_0
	- awp_crashz_crazyjump_v2
	- awp_crashz_dust_v2
	- awp_crashz_v2
	- awp_crashz_v3
	- awp_forest_crash
	- awp_lego_2_v3
	- awp_lego_8
	- awp_minecraft_crashz

> ### Most of them are made for noscope only!

====

> ### Highly recommended plugins for this maps:	
		
	â€¢ noscope/nozoom Plugin for AWP
	â€¢ longjump/bunnyhop Plugin
	â€¢ no fall damage Plugin (must have)
	â€¢ restricted weapons 
	and maybe a plugin that prevent players from using knife only


> ### **Here is a server with this plugins/maps: [Click me!](http://www.gametracker.com/server_info/188.40.62.2:27400/ "http://www.gametracker.com/server_info/188.40.62.2:27400/")**


====
